EmailTemplate.subject: Your Honeywell Tech Pubs Request {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Please note that your current subscription will be expiring on DATE. The renewal must be approved and paid in full before the expiration of your current subscription to retain access to Technical Publications,
You can now review, finalize and pay your invoice online by following the attached renewal instructions via Honeywell Forge.
The objective of Honeywell Forge Dashboard is to provide one location to administer subscriptions. Eliminates the need for customers to navigate to, and login to, individual sites for both.
Actions needed:
· Approve/Reject renewal invoice
· Process invoice payment online
Note: We have enclosed process steps for your reference.
If you are unable to finish the renewal process online, you can still choose to accept your renewal as normal by replying to pubs@honeywell.com Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFirstName} Honeywell Aerospace Technical Publications Team Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com 1-800-601-3099 or internationally at 1-602-365-3099
